BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO ACTIA_SCH_PHY_VRIFIC_TRN (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_COMMITTE_CODE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, NUM_PHYSICAL_VER_SLNO, NUM_COMMITTE_SLNO ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO ACTIA_SCH_PHY_VRIFIC_DTL ( GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE ,STR_COMMITTE_CODE , NUM_DEPARTMENT_CODE, DT_SCHEDULE_FROM_DATE, DT_SCHEDULE_TO_DATE , STR_SCHEDULE_TIME_FROM ,STR_SCHEDULE_TIME_TO,STR_ORDER_NUMBER, DT_ORDER_DATE ,GSTR_REMARKS ,GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,NUM_PHYSICAL_VER_SLNO) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
DELETE FROM ACTIA_SCH_PHY_VRIFIC_DTL T WHERE T.NUM_PHYSICAL_VER_SLNO=? and t.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTIA_SCH_PHY_VRIFIC_TRN T SET T.STR_COMMITTE_CODE=?,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,T.GNUM_ISVALID=? WHERE T.NUM_PHYSICAL_VER_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
